back.name: Utility Fog Halbonaut
back.ability: All of your stacks are Glitch-free.
back.future: UPLIFT FUTURE: Req = Robots not Emancipated, Human at a promoted Bernal & spend 20 Aqua. Effects = Every Robot becomes Emancipated, Casus belli for War, 12 VP.

back.name: Group Mind Immortalists
back.ability: May perform the faction privileges on both sides of your Crew card.
back.future: PAN SAPIENS FUTURE: Req = Have 3 Factories connected to Space Elevators. Effect = Casus belli for War. (Endgame) +2 VP for each glory chit owned.

back.name: Soldier Caste
back.ability: All your Humans can commit Felonies, even if defending Humans are present.
back.future: SECESSION FUTURE: Req = 2 Promoted Human Colonists at an Anchored Bernal with Dirtside 5+. Effects = Casus belli for War, 10 VP.

back.name: Martian Assembly
back.ability: Acts as a Freighter when building a Space Elevator.
back.future: BEANSTALK FUTURE: Req = Have 3+ Space Elevators built by any player. Effect (Endgame) = +3 VP for each Factory connected to a Space Elevator.

back.name: Wet-Nano Seed Sail
back.ability: -2 to Colocated size rolls on Synodic Comets. Can't enter aerobrakes.
back.future: NEW VENUS FUTURE: Req = Decommission operational 7+ net thrust thruster on industrialized Synodic Comet (yours). 12 VP + (Endgame) remove all tokens on Venus & comet.

back.name: New Attica Secessionists
back.ability: Boost costs are doubled for all your opponents.
back.future: SECESSION FUTURE: Req = 2 Promoted Human Colonists at a promoted Anchored Bernal. Effects = Casus belli for War, 7 VP.

back.name: Iceworms
back.ability: Performs epic hazard operation as a free action, & is not Decommissioned if it fails.
back.future: SUBMARINER FUTURE: Req = Build 3 Submarines. Effect = Doubles your dirtside hydration, not cumulative with other modifiers.

back.name: Rental Body Guild
back.future: ET LIFE FUTURE: Req = Have 2 or more Astrobiological Colonies. Effect (Endgame): +2 VP per Astrobiological Colony.

back.name: Svalbard Caretakers
back.ability: -1 on all size rolls when prospecting Synodic Sites.
back.future: DYSON BUBBLE FUTURE: Req = Both Sites of Mercury industrialized by any player. Effects = 5 VP per Factory owned on Mercury.

back.name: Renaissance Man
back.ability: If initiating a research auction, can search through one patent deck and choose the card to be auctioned.
back.future: ARTIFICIAL CONSCIOUSNESS FUTURE: Req = 2 promoted Colonists at an Astrobiology Dirtside. Effects = May free market any number of cards, 10 VP.

back.name: Blue Goo Sybonts
back.ability: Can produce ET products of Spectral Type C at any Factory.
back.future: SETI FUTURE: Req = Industrialize 2 Jovian Tojans, 1 each in the Greek & Trojan camps. Effects = As a free action perform 1 inspiration + 1 homestead, 10 VP.

back.name: Neumann Matter
back.ability: All of your stacks are Glitch-free.
back.future: UPLIFT FUTURE: Req = Robots not Emancipated, Human at a promoted Bernal & spend 20 Aqua. Effects = Every Robot becomes Emancipated, Casus belli for War, 12 VP.

back.name: Alchemist Aviatrices
back.ability: During Factory Refuel, double the amount of isotope fuel.
back.future: AEROSTAT FUTURE: Req = Promoted Bernal with Aerostat Dirtside. Effects = Can homestead as a free action, 14 VP.

back.name: Frankenstein Navigator
back.future: UPLIFT FUTURE: Req = Robots not Emancipated, Human at a promoted Bernal & spend 20 Aqua. Effects = Every Robot becomes Emancipated, Casus belli for War, 12 VP.

back.name: Josephson Implants
back.future: SUPREME CULT FUTURE: Req = Active Law in authority. Effects (Module 0) = May lobby w/o removing the delegate used. All Seniority Disks migrate to authority. (Endgame): 10 VP.

back.name: Creeper Neogen
back.ability: All of your stacks are Glitch-free.
back.future: UPLIFT FUTURE: Req = Robots not Emancipated, Human at a promoted Bernal & spend 20 Aqua. Effects = Every Robot becomes Emancipated, Casus belli for War, 12 VP.

back.name: Kaluga Naniteers
back.ability: Your Aqua from a Free Market is doubled.
back.future: TNO FUTURE: Req = Industrialize 2 Sites in the Neptune Zone. Effects = Can homestead as a free action, 12 VP.

back.name: Eugenic Pilgrims
back.ability: Faction privilege not lost in Anarchy. -1 to Colocated size rolls on Synodic Comets.
back.future: FOOTFALL FUTURE: Req = Decommission operational 7+ net thrust thruster on Industrialized Synodic Comet (yours). Effects = 10 VP + Casus belli. (Endgame) All tokens on the comet eliminated.
